Defend.definition: to drive danger or attack away from [using a weapon to oneself] 2

1.definition: to take action against attack or challenge [not justified in striking first, but may ]

2.definition: to present a defense [may not thereafter on grounds of insanity "W. R. LaFave and A. W. Scott, Jr."]

3.definition: to deny or oppose the rights of a plaintiff in regard to (a suit or claim) [intend to the case]
